title: Raised Back of Hand

adjectives: Increased, particularly above a normal level.
verbs: Raise the level or amount of something
nouns: A return made with the back of the hand facing the direction of the stroke
The backhand is a tennis shot in which one swings the racquet around one's body with the back of the hand preceding the palm.
A stroke made across the chest from the off-hand side to the racquet hand side; a stroke during which the back of the hand faces the shot.

description: A raised hand, showing the reverse side of the palm. May be paired with the forward-facing raised hand emoji.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's raised back of hand emoji displays a clean, stylized hand with its palm facing away, rendered with smooth gradients and soft rounded edges that feel approachable and modern. The subtle gloss on the knuckles and the gentle shadowing give it a lifelike quality, embodying a gesture of stopping, caution, or acknowledgment on Apple devices. It's a versatile symbol for pausing a conversation or signaling a clear boundary.
